text:
="preserve">Iwannis Louis Awad (17 April 1934 – 18 November 2020) was a Syriac Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1957. He was titular bishop of 'Zeugma in Syria' and as apostolic exarch of the Syriac Catholic Apostolic Exarchate of Venezuela from 2003 to 2011.
Awad died on 18 November 2020 at the age of 86.

annotations.surface_form: Syriac Catholic Apostolic Exarchate of Venezuela
